spells.name: Adoration
spells.description: You gain a bonus on Diplomacy checks and performance combat checks.

spells.name: Bestow Weapon Proficiency
spells.description: Grants a creature proficiency in a single weapon for short period of time.

spells.name: Destabilize Powder
spells.description: Ammunition in the targeted firearm is prone to misfire.

spells.name: Frost Fall
spells.description: The area is covered in a chilling frost.

spells.name: Mask Dweomer, Communal
spells.description: As mask dweomer, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Mount, Communal
spells.description: As mount, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Qualm
spells.description: Target gains penalties on ability checks, skill checks, and concentration checks until it spends an entire round doing nothing.

spells.name: Recoil Fire
spells.description: Ammunition in the targeted firearm generates excessive recoil.

spells.name: Reinforce Armaments, Communal
spells.description: As reinforce armaments, but you may divide the spell's duration among objects touched.

spells.name: Returning Weapon
spells.description: Grants a weapon the returning special weapon quality.

spells.name: Stabilize Powder
spells.description: Ammunition in the targeted firearm is less likely to misfire.

spells.name: Thunder Fire
spells.description: Ammunition in the targeted firearm deafens opponents.
